channel.title: Devello Inc Blog
channel.description: Insights on digital creativity and innovation in real estate technology

item.title: How to build in the digital
item.description: The introduction of digital intelligence has paved the way for learning and rapid implementation of ideas, transforming how we approach creative problem-solving and innovation in the modern world.

item.title: The art of creation
item.description: Exploring the relationship between creative freedom and the mental constraints such freedom introduces, revealing how boundaries can paradoxically enhance artistic expression.

item.title: What are tools?
item.description: How the unique ability of humans to craft and use tools has helped change the course of history, from primitive implements to digital technologies.
